string-bundle.string: Errors found during startup. Please see startup.log for more details.
Use this dialog to create a new User Profile.
The profile path must be specified.
A profile name must be supplied.
Enter a full path to where this profile should live on disk.
Enter a name for this new Profile.
The directory chosen must be empty (or a previously created Raven profile directory).
The path chosen must be a directory (not a file).
Use this dialog to manage your Raven profiles. Please create and/or choose a profile to continue.
Also delete all of the files in the '%s' profile?
Enable this option if you only ever want one Profile
Could not find static HTML file named '%s'.
Failed to load the default perspective (please contact Zoundry Support).
Use this dialog to import a profile from Zoundry Blog Writer 1.x.
Enter the path to your Zoundry Blog Writer 1.x User Profile.
Choose a Zoundry Blog Writer 1.x Profile
A path to a Zoundry Blog Writer 1.x profile must be specified.
Use this dialog to specify your new Raven Profile (imported from Windows Live Writer).
Incorrect listener type (should be an instance of IZRunnableProgressListener).
Imported FTP and media store information.
Failed to save the account to directory '%s'.
No deserializer found for account with namespace '%s'.
Failed to deserialize document: no 'mode' found for content.
Failed to save the media storage with id '%s'.
No media site with id '%s' found.
Failed to add media storage: a store named %s already exists.
Media site '%s' referenced a media storage type that does not exist (%s).
Media site property attempted to override a property that doesn't exist in its storage type (%s).
There are %d running tasks that can't be resumed later. Cancel these tasks?
Test file still exists at URL '%s'.
Failed to delete file from Media Storage.
Delete test file from Media Storage...
Failed to find test file in Media Storage file list.
Verify test file in Media Storage file list...
Test file exists but is the wrong size.
Failed to verify URL '%s' (file not found).
Verify URL of uploaded test file...
Media Storage '%s' [upload] did not return a URL.
Failed to upload test file to Media Storage '%s'.
Use this dialog to edit the settings for a Media Storage.
Use this dialog to manage your Media Storages (add, edit, delete, etc...).
Please take a moment to confirm your settings.
Enter a friendly name for this Media Storage. (Example: Book Review Blog FTP Storage)
Choose a type of Media Storage from the list.
Please select a Media Storage Type.
Use this wizard to create a new Media Storage. Zoundry Raven uses a Media Storage to upload images and other resources to some remote site so that they are properly linked in your Blog post..
Welcome to the New Media Storage Wizard
A Media Storage named '%s' already exists.
You must specify a name for this Media Storage.
'%s' has been modified. Save the changes?
Welcome to the New Blog Account Wizard
Use the New Blog Account Wizard to create a Blog Account. Zoundry Raven requires a Blog Account so that it knows how to publish content to your Blog(s).
The Blog URL must be valid taking the form http://hostname/path
Please choose a account name and enter the blog API information.
Enter a name for the account associated with this site
Account name with name '%s' already exists. Please choose a different name.
Account name is empty. Please enter name for the site account.
Enter your blog site API username.
The username is empty. Please enter your account username.
Enter your blog site API password.
The password is empty. Please enter your account password.
Enter your blog site API url.
The API URL is required and must be valid taking the form http://hostname/path
Select blog to download posts and choose image upload mechanism.
Choose method to upload images and other media.
Use this dialog to update the list of blogs in this account and download recent posts.
Document to delete is not available.
Document to publish is not available.
A valid URL for 'endpoint' is required.
Add 'Powered By Zoundry' to the post footer
Add 'Powered By Zoundry' to the post footer
Use this dialog to manage your accounts, including adding, removing, and editing account settings.
Pastes the contents of the clipboard.
This post has one or more files that are not in the portable drive. Would you like to copy these files to the portable drive?
Could not find template serializer for namespace %s.
Could not find template deserializer for namescpace %s.
Changes to the system tray settings will take effect after restarting the application.
No content was dropped into the editor because the blog post being dropped has not yet been published.
View the blog post in your default browser.
Open the blog post in the editor.
Copy post link URL to the clipboard
Spell check is not supported by this editor
Spell check is not enabled. Would you like to enable spell check now?
View the blog in the default browser.
Could not determine URL for blog '%s'.
Add 'Powered by Zoundry' to the post footer
Use this dialog to insert an image file.
Use this dialog to edit image properties.
Please enter a valid image location URL.
Use this dialog to create/edit a HTML hyperlink.
Open in a new window when link is clicked.
Open the About Zoundry Raven dialog.
Open the Media Storage Manager dialog
Drop/Paste the clipboard contents as a Zoundry Raven Blog Post.
You have %d account(s) without a configured Media Storage. Associate this storage with those accounts now?
Send some feedback to Zoundry about Raven (bug report, enhancement request, etc).
Found %d unsaved document(s) (most likely because Raven crashed or was terminated). Recover these documents?
This dialog notifies you of potential problems with the document you are publishing.
We have detected that you have Windows Live Writer installed. Would you like to import those settings into Raven?
We have detected that you have Zoundry Blog Writer installed. Would you like to import those settings into Raven?
Downloading the template for your blog named '%s'.
Analysing blog content to determine template.
We were unable to detect your blog's template from existing blog content.
The blog has no posts to analyze for the blog template.
Use this dialog to add a template from an existing Blog that Raven knows about.
Make this template the default for this blog
Pick a friendly name for this template (e.g. 'My Blog Template').
A template with that name already exists, please choose a different name.
Please enter a name for your template (e.g. 'My Blog Template').
Use this dialog to add and remove blog templates.
Open the Blog Template Manager dialog
Format or insert XHTML block tags
Run Tidy to clean up XHTML code
Remove this blog - use this if you do not want to publish to this blog.
Publish to additional blog(s) - use this if you want to publish this content to multiple blogs.

Note: if you have a Zoundry Service Account, you need to manually convert your product links into Zoundry Affiliate Links using the menu option that appears when you right-click on a qualifying product link in the Blog Post editor.
If you do not wish to support Zoundry in this way, simply check the box above, and we'll stop doing it.

By default, Zoundry Raven will convert any product links in your blog posts (Amazon.com links, for example) into affiliate links that could potentially earn us some money. This is one of the ways we try to keep Zoundry Raven free for our users.
Successfully converted product link, inserting into HTML.
I don't have a blog yet!
Makes an unsaved, unpublished copy of the selected blog post and opens it in the editor.
Use this dialog to translate Raven into a specific language. For each string in the list, select a string to translate, then type the translation text and press ENTER.
If you cancel, all of your translation changes will be lost. Cancel anyway?
Use this dialog to create a new Raven translation - choose your language and (optionally) country.
Use this window to add/edit translations.
You must have write access to the Zoundry Raven installation directory.
Finally, publish your post (using the Publish button on either the main application or editor toolbar).
Next, you can author/write a new post.
First, use the Account Creation Wizard to create your new Blog Account. You must have an account with an online Blog System such as Blogger.com or TypePad.com.
View this Blog in the default browser (online)
Post a new entry to this Blog
Go to the Zoundry Raven Dashboard.
Collapse all nodes in the tree.
Raven is *still* not authorized (something went wrong).
Raven is not yet Flickr authorized.
Click here once you have authorized Raven:

You must now log in to Flickr to authorize Zoundry Raven as an 'allowed client', otherwise Flickr will not let us upload pictures. Authorizing Raven is simple, start the process by clicking the 'Begin' button below. Your browser will open up and direct you to Flickr. Follow the instructions, then come back and click the 'Authorized' button below.
Checks if a new version of Zoundry Raven is available for download.
Get forum support for Zoundry Raven.
